product_name: BRU Instant Coffee, 100g: Amazon.in: Amazon Pantry

reviews.review_body: This is a typical last resort coffee when you're broke. Tastel like burnt remains of a wooden log.

I'm a coffee lover and bru is my favourite, the aroma the taste everything is perfect abt it as compared to nescafe that tastes like burnt wood waste. The pricing by amazon makes it even more delightful, awesome coffee plus savings in my pocket too.

reviews.review_title: Nice everyday coffee at a very good price!
reviews.review_body: 1. Good coffee for everyday use. I used Nescafe classic earlier but switched to Bru and find it better!2. Amazon gives amazing prices on the coffee in Amazon pantry so totally happy with the savings!

It's good to start your mornings with a cup of hot Bru Instant Coffee. If you know how to do it right, you'll not have another brand. The chicory content is more in this, which I don't like. Chicory is just a filler to reduce coffee cost and is not good for health.
Bru is awesome in taste. Earlier i was using Nescafe but switched on bru just to taste. But then i really liked it's flavour and never go back. Must buy.

reviews.review_title: Bru and nestle instant coffees tasted the same. But for filter coffee I prefer nestle
reviews.review_body: They don't try to change much from what they were when they started and I'm happy that my coffee tastes how it used to be...

reviews.review_title: Tastes better than any other brand...
reviews.review_body: I have tried many other instant coffee brands. Nothing tastes better than bru instant. Amazon gives you a good deal for your pocket..
Great product with excellent flavour. Since 40 years i am using this without break.
